items.composition: 100% Cotton
items.designDetail: - Fit: Relaxed
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
NY POP ART

UT has long partnered with pop art pioneers, including Andy Warhol, Keith Haring, and Jean-Michel Basquiat. These legendary artists have left behind various works that make art more accessible and enjoyable for people. Experience the joy of wearing pop art that is loved across generations.

Andy Warhol
As the preeminent American artist of the 20th century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. Since its founding in 1987, in accordance with Andy Warhols will, The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts has established itself among the leading funders of contemporary art in the United States. Proceeds the Foundation receives from licensing projects such as this contribute to the Foundations endowment from which these grants are distributed.

// The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.

features.text: The material features moisture-absorbing and Heat of Absorption functions. Extra Warm HEATTECH is approximately 1.5 times* warmer than regular HEATTECH. *Based on CLO values, which indicate the thermal insulation of clothing. Compared to standard 'HEATTECH.' *Recommended for temperatures of -5C to 15C. This is a guide when worn in combination with other clothing. The most comfortable temperature range will vary from person to person.
New design made with a fluffy yarn and soft fabric. Comfortable 'HEATTECH' with 100% cotton on the inside.
Made with Ultra Stretch fabric in a moderate fit, making it ideal for innerwear bottoms.

items.longDescription:

- Highly durable fabric keeps its shape well even after repeated washing.

items.longDescription:
KAWS WINTER

A holiday collection of knitwear from our newly appointed Artist in Residence, KAWS. Keep warm this winter with cashmere, premium wool, and material of souffle yarn' sweaters, beanies, gloves and scarves all adorned with KAWS's signature XX or his iconic COMPANION character. All of the accessories have HEATTECH' to make sure you stay warm this season. With a variety of colors to choose from, theres a style for every member of the family.

Meet our inaugural Artist in Residence, KAWS, a contemporary artist renowned for his distinctive art style that subverts pop culture. KAWS has collaborated with UNIQLO since 2016.

KAWS
items.name: Lambswool Crew Neck Sweater
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.careInstruction: Check the care label, gently hand wash, rinse lightly, and spin for a short time. Reshape while damp, hang to dry in the shade, and before it is completely dry, loosen the padding, then hang it up to dry again. If there are any lumps or shifting, lightly adjust them.

features.text: Lightweight, warm, high-performance 'PUFFTECH' padding, made with the latest fiber technology. Hollow fibers trap warm air to keep you warm. *Comparison of polyester fiber with human hair thickness of 0.08 mm.
Anti-static lining. Water-repellent finish protects against light rain. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
Gathers helps block out the cold air with added contour tape at the armholes and hem.
Packable for easy carrying.

items.longDescription:
- Stays puffy and retains heat even in environments with a humidity of 90% or higher..
- Hand-washable for easy care.
- Roomy fit lets you wear it as outerwear.
items.name: Pufftech Vest
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.careInstruction: Check the care label, gently hand wash, rinse lightly, and spin for a short time. Reshape while damp, hang to dry in the shade, and before it is completely dry, loosen the padding, then hang it up to dry again. If there are any lumps or shifting, lightly adjust them.
items.composition: Face: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Polyester/ Filling: 100% Polyester/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.designDetail: - Storage pouch: Without a storage pouch
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.

features.text: Lightweight, warm, high-performance 'PUFFTECH' padding, made with the latest fiber technology.

Special material is made by weaving two layers of fabric together, so there are no needle holes, helping to keep rain and cold air out. The outer fabric has a water-repellent finish that repels light rain, so it can be used on rainy days. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
Contouring fabric at the cuffs and from the sides to the back of the hem to keep cold air out.

items.longDescription:
- Hollow fibers about 1/5 the thickness of a human hair trap warm air for extra warmth. *Comparison of polyester fiber with human hair thickness of 0.08 mm.
- Stays puffy and maintains heat retention even in environments with a humidity of 90% or more.
- Hand-washable for easy care.
- 3D-cut design allows easy arm movement.
items.name: Pufftech Jacket
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.careInstruction: Check the care label, gently hand wash, rinse lightly, and spin for a short time. Reshape while damp, hang to dry in the shade, and before it is completely dry, loosen the padding, then hang it up to dry again. If there are any lumps or shifting, lightly adjust them.

features.text: Lightweight, warm, high-performance 'PUFFTECH' padding, made with the latest fiber technology. Hollow fibers trap warm air to keep you warm.
The padding stays puffy and maintains heat retention even in environments with a humidity of 90% or more. Quicker-drying than natural down. Hand-washable for easy care.
Outer material made with Torays NANODESIGN technology for improved water-repellency. Water-repellent finish protects against light rain. *The finish is not permanent. Anti-static lining.
Sleek, regular fit. Specially cut for easy movement when your arms are raised and a lovely style when your arms are down by your side.
Packable design is perfect for traveling.

items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

features.text: Contouring, high-performance fabric is windproof and water breathable. Water-repellent finish protects against light rain. *The finish is not permanent.
Designed to prevent water from entering through the seams, with a water resistant fastener at the front.
Regular fit for comfort and ease of movement. The 3D cut provides ample movement around the shoulders.
Drawstring at the hem lets you adjust the fit. Cuffs with hook-and-loop fastener for fit adjustment easily.

items.longDescription:
KAWS WINTER

A holiday collection of knitwear from our newly appointed Artist in Residence, KAWS. Keep warm this winter with cashmere, premium wool, and material of souffle yarn' sweaters, beanies, gloves and scarves all adorned with KAWS's signature XX or his iconic COMPANION character. All of the accessories have HEATTECH' to make sure you stay warm this season. With a variety of colors to choose from, theres a style for every member of the family.

Meet our inaugural Artist in Residence, KAWS, a contemporary artist renowned for his distinctive art style that subverts pop culture. KAWS has collaborated with UNIQLO since 2016.

KAWS
